A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ugh\, saw it today\, the whole storyline for Rey is laughable. When Luke was young\, he was trained by Kenobi and Yoda\, and then had months of self-training -- yet still lost a hand to Vader. Throughout the movie\, Rey is never trained by anyone. No training. No effort. No rigor. Zero. Zilch. And yet Rey can somehow defeat Luke Freaking Skywalker when they're sparring. And then she goes on to defeat three Emperor's Guard in combat. It reeks of immaturity & entitlement.
